Invocation Name: thunder sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience a relaxing thunderstorm and the soothing sound of a background rain storm, with Thunder Sounds by Healing FM, a top-rated Alexa Developer. Perfect to help you study, relax or sleep.

HOW TO START
Just say: "Alexa, open Thunder Sounds"

LOOPING
To enable looping, open the Skill, and while the sound is playing, say: "Alexa... Loop On". This will loop the sound until you ask Alexa to Stop, or you say "Alexa… Loop Off". The Pro version has the Super Audio Loop, with 10 hours of no-gap playback.

TRY THUNDER SOUNDS FOR
+ Good night's sleep
+ Peaceful environment
+ Improving your mood
+ Focus on study
+ Meditation

UNLIMITED PRO FEATURES
+ 10 Hours Seamless Loop
+ Unlimited Looping (play for days!)
+ Our Ultimate Audio Quality

REVIEWS & FEEDBACK
We’d love your feedback and would appreciate if you could leave us a review for this skill. If you have any questions or need support, please contact: team@healing.fm

ALL OUR SOUNDS

HEALING FM STUDIOS
From our studios next to the beautiful Pacific Ocean, we create and broadcast high quality relaxation experiences. Every month, more than 1 million people around the world use Healing FM sounds to find a moment of relaxation or prepare for a peaceful night's sleep. We hope you enjoy our sounds!
